ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:6, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // It happened when Dyne and I were
out of town for a few days.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // Corel was burned down by
the Shinra troops.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // All the townspeople…
All my relatives……
Everyone…everything…

dialogStrings:
It happened when Dyne and I were
out of town for a few days.

Corel was burned down by
the Shinra troops.
